english_translation: Narrated by Ali: The Prophet ﷺ used to give away portions (anfal) in the quarter and the fifth and the third, and Ali said: The anfal is only before the division, and there is no anfal after the division. I asked Zayd ibn Ali about the fifth, and he said: It is for us when we are in need of it, but when we become rich, we have no right to it.

english_translation: Narrated by Ali: When one of the two parents becomes Muslim and the children are small, the children become Muslim by the Islam of whoever became Muslim from the two parents. If the children grow up and both refuse Islam, they are killed. And if the children are already grown and mature, they do not become Muslim by the Islam of the two parents.
